resources.string: Through this game, we will be testing your perspectives. How well do you know destination around the world? From London,UK to Ames, IA, USA, you will be tested on both your knowledge of locations as well as your ability to search for clues within a given landscape.

First, select a game Mode. Then when you begin the game, you will find yourself in a Google Street View in an unknown location. Given your knowledge and the clues in the landscape, you will have to discern where you are. By clicking the button, four possible locations will appear and with your wit, you will need to make a decision. The game will terminate based on the game mode, and then at the very end you will be able to see how you stack up against other players.
